entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Check out the morbidity and mortality in Arizona; it’s NOT good. Trump is ignoring the fact that Covid-19 cases are increasing and we’re losing ~1000 souls/day. But by all means, keep on lying to the American people. Trump is a monumental LIAR.
